scenes.description: Hajime introduces her solo song 'Bibide Babide' and describes its style as a dance number with a nighttime vibe and heavy bass.
The members discuss the time-of-day theme for their respective solo songs: Raden (dawn), Kanade (morning), Ririka (afternoon), and Hajime (night).
The group announces their 2nd Anniversary 3D special live on September 13th and talks about their preparations and excitement.
Kanade reflects on her growth over the past year, specifically her focus on vocal training to handle dancing and singing simultaneously.
Hajime shares her experience of challenging herself with new dance genres, including tap dance, starting from scratch to evolve as a performer.

subtitles.original: 見ててください！
subtitles.english: Please watch!

subtitles.original: あー、最後は夜明けから始まるソロ曲『ビビデバビデ』でした！
subtitles.english: Ah, and finally, my solo song 'Bibide Babide' starts from the dawn!

subtitles.original: 何でー！？
subtitles.english: Wait, why!?

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデだ！
subtitles.english: It's Bibide Babide!

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデ！
subtitles.english: Bibide Babide!

subtitles.original: ソロ曲なんですけど...
subtitles.english: It's a solo song, but...

subtitles.original: すごいダンスナンバーで、こう...
subtitles.english: it's a high-energy dance number, where...

subtitles.original: ドゥンドゥンって鳴る低音が、こう、ズンズンなってて...
subtitles.english: the bass goes 'doon doon', thumping like this...

subtitles.original: なんかサビに音がちょっと少ないんだけど...
subtitles.english: the sound is a bit sparse in the chorus...

subtitles.original: 静かな静寂の中で、ドゥン、ドゥン、ドゥン、って...
subtitles.english: in the quiet stillness, it goes 'thump, thump, thump'...

subtitles.original: ちょっとノった感じの。私、結構ダウナーなんですけど...
subtitles.english: it's got a groove to it. I'm usually quite a downer...

subtitles.original: その、夜のちょっとダウナーな、静かな感じと...
subtitles.english: that nighttime, slightly downer, quiet vibe...

subtitles.original: その低音のドゥンドゥンっていうカッコ良さが合わさった曲になってて。
subtitles.english: and that cool, heavy bass combined in one song.

subtitles.original: なんかこう、夜にちょっと、あ～って...
subtitles.english: It's like something you listen to at night and just...

subtitles.original: あ～聴きたい！
subtitles.english: Oh, I want to hear it!

subtitles.original: 一人で聴いてほしいなって。
subtitles.english: I want you to listen to it alone.

subtitles.original: ラップとかダンスブレイクもあって...
subtitles.english: There's also rap and a dance break...

subtitles.original: すごいカッコいい曲になってるので、ぜひ聴いてください！
subtitles.english: it's a really cool song, so please listen to it!

subtitles.original: 聴いてください！
subtitles.english: Please listen!

subtitles.original: 実はあれなんだよね、ソロ曲それぞれ...
subtitles.english: Actually, the thing is, each of our solo songs...

subtitles.original: 時間帯が変わっていくんだよね。
subtitles.english: represents a different time of day.

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね。
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right.

subtitles.original: らでんが夜明け前で...
subtitles.english: Raden's is before dawn...

subtitles.original: 奏が朝！
subtitles.english: Kanade's is morning!

subtitles.original: リリカがお昼！
subtitles.english: Ririka's is noon!

subtitles.original: はじめ夜！
subtitles.english: Hajime's is night!

subtitles.original: そう！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: この順に聴くと、さらに深みが増すんじゃないかなと。
subtitles.english: If you listen to them in this order, it might add more depth.

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: という感じでね...
subtitles.english: So, in that way...

subtitles.original: ReGLOSSのみんなの個性が詰まった楽曲になってるので。
subtitles.english: each song is filled with the personality of ReGLOSS.

subtitles.original: 概要欄にリンクが貼ってありますので。
subtitles.english: There are links in the description box.

subtitles.original: そちらもぜひ聴いてみてください！
subtitles.english: So please check those out too!

subtitles.original: 聴いてねー！
subtitles.english: Listen to them!

subtitles.original: MC長いよ、って思われてるかもしれないけど...
subtitles.english: You might be thinking this talk segment is too long...

subtitles.original: 思ってないよ！
subtitles.english: They're not!

subtitles.original: もうちょいだけ喋らせて。この後すぐに歌うので。
subtitles.english: Let us talk just a bit more. We'll sing right after.

subtitles.original: あとちょっとね、待っててね。
subtitles.english: Wait just a little longer, okay?

subtitles.original: しかもですね、私たち今年の9月で...
subtitles.english: What's more, this September...

subtitles.original: なんとデビュー2周年を迎えます！
subtitles.english: we'll celebrate our 2nd anniversary!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!
Really!?

subtitles.original: そう。デビュー2周年を迎えるということは？
subtitles.english: Yes. And reaching our 2nd anniversary means...?

subtitles.original: お、何？
subtitles.english: Oh, what?

subtitles.original: 3Dの記念配信もあるということ！
subtitles.english: That there's going to be a 3D anniversary stream!

subtitles.original: 初めて聞いた！
subtitles.english: First time I've heard that!

subtitles.original: 9月13日の土曜日に...
subtitles.english: On Saturday, September 13th...

subtitles.original: 3D記念配信があります！
subtitles.english: there will be a 3D anniversary stream!

subtitles.original: 9月13日(土) 20時「ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary」
subtitles.english: September 13th (Sat) 20:00 "ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary"

subtitles.original: 何するのー？
subtitles.english: What are you doing?

subtitles.original: 歌ったり、踊ったりしちゃうんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Won't we be singing and dancing?

subtitles.original: 漫才じゃないんですか？番長だけが踊る...
subtitles.english: Isn't it comedy? Where only Bancho dances...

subtitles.original: 何で！？みんなで歌って踊ろうよ！
subtitles.english: Why!? Let's all sing and dance together!

subtitles.original: え～どうしようかな。
subtitles.english: Hmm, what should we do?

subtitles.original: 何でみんな驚いてるの。
subtitles.english: Why is everyone so surprised?

subtitles.original: やるんでしょ？やんなよ！
subtitles.english: We're doing it, right? Do it!

subtitles.original: 漫才かなと思って。
subtitles.english: I thought it was comedy.

subtitles.original: 漫才じゃないよ。
subtitles.english: It's not comedy.

subtitles.original: 冗談はさておき、この2年間練習も重ねてきたので。
subtitles.english: Jokes aside, we've been practicing for two years.

subtitles.original: みんなに見てもらうために。
subtitles.english: So everyone can see us.

subtitles.original: 去年よりもパワーアップした姿をお見せしたいなと。
subtitles.english: We want to show you how much we've improved since last year!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ちなみに、この1年で変わったこととかある？
subtitles.english: By the way, has anything changed for you this past year?

subtitles.original: 変わったこと...
subtitles.english: Changed things...

subtitles.original: 何もかも変わったけどね。
subtitles.english: Everything has changed.

subtitles.original: 奏は結構変わったのあるって。
subtitles.english: Kanade, you have some big changes.

subtitles.original: ま、レッスンとかね。1周年の時にやって...
subtitles.english: Well, lessons. During our 1st anniversary live...

subtitles.original: 踊りながら歌うのって、大変だなってすごい思って。
subtitles.english: I really felt that singing while dancing is tough.

subtitles.original: 立って歌うのだったら、得意なのかなと思ってたけど。
subtitles.english: I thought I was good at singing while standing still.

subtitles.original: 体を動かしながらだと、息が上がっちゃって難しくて。
subtitles.english: But moving my body makes me out of breath and it's hard.

subtitles.original: そこからボイトレとかダンスレッスンを増やして。
subtitles.english: So I increased my vocal training and dance lessons.

subtitles.original: 奏はかなり発声が変わりました！
subtitles.english: Actually, my vocalization has changed a lot!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: 歌上手だったのに、よりグレードアップしたんだね！
subtitles.english: You were already good, but you've upgraded even more!

subtitles.original: さらに、さらに。
subtitles.english: Even more, even more.

subtitles.original: パワーアップしたので、見比べてみてください。
subtitles.english: She's powered up, so please compare the difference.

subtitles.original: 見てください！これからも進化するぞー！
subtitles.english: Please watch! I'll keep evolving!

subtitles.original: 流石、歌柱。歌柱じゃない、歌バシラ。
subtitles.english: As expected of the Song Pillar. No, Utabashira.

subtitles.original: 歌バシラは本家の人。ヤバいヤバい。
subtitles.english: Utabashira is someone else. Oh no, oh no.

subtitles.original: はじめもダンスの、新しいジャンルに挑戦したくて。
subtitles.english: I also wanted to try a new dance genre.

subtitles.original: それを今年、2つチャレンジしてて。
subtitles.english: I'm challenging two new ones this year.

subtitles.original: 一つは、言ってるタップなんだけど。
subtitles.english: One is the tap dancing I mentioned.

subtitles.original: もう一個も、別のジャンルを初めてみてたりしてて。
subtitles.english: The other is a different genre I'm trying for the first time.

subtitles.original: 超全然違うから、本当ゼロからのスタートみたいな。
subtitles.english: It's totally different, so it's like starting from zero.

subtitles.original: だから、また3Dライブとかで披露できる時に...
subtitles.english: So when I have the chance to perform at a 3D live...

subtitles.original: また進化した姿を見せられるんじゃないかなと。
subtitles.english: I hope to show you an evolved version of myself.

subtitles.original: 楽しみー！
subtitles.english: Looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: 二人は得意なことをさらにグレードアップしたんだね。
subtitles.english: So you two upgraded the things you're good at.
